hero.label: Accounting Support
hero.title: Professional Accounting Support in Germany
hero.description:
Comprehensive support for individuals and businesses.
We help you navigate the German system confidently, prepare documents correctly, establish processes, and develop your activities.

services.label: Our Services
services.title: Accounting Support and Financial Assistance in Key Areas
services.description: We are a team of consultants and specialists in accounting support, business organization, and cooperation with government institutions in Germany.
services.service1_text: We handle a wide range of accounting and administrative tasks that consultants are allowed to perform in Germany.
services.service2_title: Support for Clients Registered at the Job Center
services.service2_text: We work with official partners authorized to run coaching programs and assist clients who want to start self-employment under Job Center programs.
services.service3_text: We provide support not only at the Job Center, but also with health insurance or the tax office. Our services cover a wide range of state and non-state institutions.
services.service4_text: We accompany the entire process of starting any activity – from document preparation to obtaining a tax number and completing all initial registrations.

service1.title: Accounting support
service1.description: A full range of accounting services for your business in Germany. We take care of all routine tasks so you can focus on growing your business.
points: Managing and preparing documents for EÜR
Organizing invoices, expenses and primary documents
Structuring accounting for small businesses (Kleinunternehmer) and VAT-registered entrepreneurs
Setting up work in Elster, submitting forms and providing support
Preparing documents and materials for tax audits
Communication and administrative support in interactions with government institutions

service2.title: Support for Jobcenter clients
service2.description: We help Jobcenter clients successfully start their own business with full support at every stage.
points: Preparing the full set of documents required to receive Einstiegsgeld
Creating the business plan, financial section and justification
Assisting with document submission and communication with the Jobcenter
Coordinating the process together with our partners
Guiding the client through full self-employment registration and program approval
Providing full support free of charge for the client, as all costs are covered by the Jobcenter

service3.title: Administrative support
service3.description: Comprehensive assistance when dealing with public and private institutions in Germany. Our support covers a wide range of organizations, including:
points: City and district authorities
Ausländerbehörde and other immigration structures
Medical and social services
Insurance and pension funds, banks and financial institutions
Notaries, lawyers and consulting centers
Schools, Kindergeldstelle, Familienkasse

service4.title: Business registration in Germany
service4.description: From the idea to the first contract — full support for the process of registering and launching your business.
points: Analyzing your situation and selecting the correct form of activity
Identifying all necessary requirements for your type of work
Preparing documents and registering Gewerbe/Freiberufler/GmbH/UG (together with notary partners)
Correctly formulating the business activity descriptions
Consulting on Kleinunternehmer regulation or VAT system
Supporting the process of obtaining the tax number, submitting Anmeldung zur steuerlichen Erfassung, and obtaining the VAT ID (USt-IdNr.) if needed

expertise.title: Expertise You Can Rely On
expertise.text1:
Our team consists of highly qualified accountants with many years of experience in the German system.
We provide comprehensive solutions based on deep legal understanding and an individual approach.
expertise.text2: We understand the complexity of German law and the specifics of working with clients, which allows us to effectively protect your interests.

process.label: Work Process
process.title: A Simple and Transparent Approach to Solving Your Tasks
process.step1_text: Initial meeting or phone call to discuss your situation and determine the optimal strategy.
process.step2_text: Thorough review of documents, assessment of legal risks and opportunities.
process.step3_text: Execution of the agreed strategy, document preparation, representation of interests.
process.step4_text: Achievement of set goals, continuous support, and guidance at all stages.
